H0.text: What is the collective name for a group of hawks or falcons. Flight

H1.text: What is the collective name for a group of hawks or falcons. Swoop

H2.text: What is the collective name for a group of hawks or falcons. Talon

H3.text: What is the collective name for a group of hawks or falcons. CAST

A4.text: Flocks of birds, especially hawks, are sometimes called 'kettles' in the United States.

A5.text: They are known to form flocks when migrating, which improves survival rates over traveling alone.
